golden_ankh_of_khonshu.special_ability:
Whenever you defeat a Villain on the ROOFTOPS this turn, rescue Bystanders equal to that Villain's printed VICTORY_POINTS.
Tech: You may move a Villain to the ROOFTOPS. If another Villain is already there, swap them.

crescent_moon_darts.special_ability: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's INSTINCT or TECH, draw it.
crescent_moon_darts.flavour_text: Villains face the crescent moon's judgement. Then they get the crescent moon's judgement in their face.

climbing_claws.flavour_text: Criminals feel the cold light of the moon on their sins... but they never think to look up.

lunar_communication.special_ability:
WALL-CRAWL
Whenever you defeat a Villain on the ROOFTOPS this turn, you may KO one of your cards or a card from your discard pile.

thwip.special_ability: To play this card, you must put two cards from your hang on top of your deck.

shadowed_spiderman.special_ability:
WALL-CRAWL
You get +1 ATTACK for each other Hero you played this turn that costs 1 RECRUIT or 2 RECRUIT.

spider-sense_tingling.special_ability: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put any that cost 2 RECRUIT or less into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

dark_strength.special_ability:
WALL-CRAWL
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs 1 RECRUIT or 2 RECRUIT, you get +2 ATTACK.
